column2:
"Hey there. You can call me Hans. And if I remember right, you're...
<%me>?"
"Surprised? You're famous, killer. I joined up same time as you did, but you've been makin' some real waves."
"Ah, sorry, guess I'm ramblin' a bit. How'd you like to be friends? You're kind of a role model to me."
"Anyway, you go take out some Natives, and I'll watch ya from here. Good luck to ya!"
